prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon with swirling purple energy and glowing green accents.
Imagine a spooky Pokemon made of shadows and fog, with eerie eyes peeking out.
Design a unique creature that embodies the essence of spirits and energy fields.
Show me a playful ghost Pokemon with a mischievous grin and a fluffy appearance.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a haunted tree with glowing orbs floating around it.
Make a whimsical spirit Pokemon that blends colors of pink and green with a fluffy texture.
Give me an ethereal creature that has a haunting presence and a friendly disposition.
